attributes.action: Punish shopkeepers that sell cigarettes and alchohol to under age children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a shopkeeper is caught selling alchohol or cigarettes to children they should br prosecuted in every case. Their complete stock of whatever they are guilty of selling illegally should be confiscated and either destroyed or put up for auction with the proceeds given to charity.
